section.title: billing controlling quantity for Select Billing Quantity
section.para: To specify billing quantities for Line Items in the "Select Order for Billing" screen, double-click on a Line Item in the "Line Items" display--or highlight the Line Item and select the EDIT SELECTION button. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Select Billing Quantity for Line Item

section.para: When selecting the billing quantity for a Line Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Displays Sales Order Line Item Number.
Displays Item Number of Line Item.
Enter the quantity you want to select for billing.
Select to close the specified Line Item after billing.

tip.para: If you are shipping a partial quantity to a Customer, be sure to leave the "Close this Line After Billing" option unchecked. This will ensure the Sales Order Item remains open until the full quantity has been shipped.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without selecting a billing quantity, returning you to the previous screen.
Selects the specified quantity for billing, returning you to the previous screen.
